title: Revolutions
description: The final conclusion of the Pendomus Chronicles. With the fate of Pendomus resting on the shoulders of Runa--the Daughter of Five, no one but her is more acutely aware of what could go wrong. With Videus desperately trying to control the fates, she knows she's running out of time to fulfill her destiny. Especially since she didn't complete her trials.Meanwhile, Trae's odd behaviors have reached a climax and unless he figures out what's wrong, he could be Runa's undoing.
author: Carissa Andrews
